Text: Vivre sa Vie (released in the U.S. as My Life to Live and in the UK as It's My Life) is a 1962 film directed by Jean-Luc Godard. The full original title is Vivre sa Vie: Film en Douze Tableaux, or "To Live One's Life: A Film in Twelve Scenes."
